<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 14"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=4692) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Cleric" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=554" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 120 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Trigger**
You critically hit a creature that is not on its home plane

**Requirements**
You have a banishment spell prepared

</column>

---

The force of your blow sends your victim back to its home plane. You expend a [_banishment_](/Spells.aspx?ID=19) spell you have prepared, affecting the creature you critically hit without needing to cast the spell. The creature can attempt to resist the spell as normal.

<title level="2">Swift Banishment leads to...</title>
[Improved Swift Banishment](/Feats.aspx?ID=4700)
